LanguageData.XylCommandFlyDesc: Start flying. Flying grants increased movement speed and allows travelling over some obstacles.
LanguageData.XylCommandAutoFlyDesc: The character will automatically start flying if they are moving and the fly ability is off cooldown.
LanguageData.XylCommandMilkDesc: Allow other characters to milk this character.
LanguageData.XylCommandMilkOnlyWhenFullDesc: Only allow milking when this character's breast milk is full.
LanguageData.XylAtavismChanceDesc: The chance of the carrier having an extra gene due to the atavism gene.
LanguageData.XylAtavismGenesDesc: The extra genes added to this character by the atavism gene.
LanguageData.XylGenderRatioDesc: The chance of characters of this xenotype being male or female.
LanguageData.XylMilkProductionDesc: The number of milk items this character can produce in a day if well-fed.
LanguageData.XylRageChanceDesc: The chance of this character flying into a rage when damaged. While enraged, the character is uncontrollable and automatically charges at nearby enemies.
LanguageData.XylSubstituteCapacityAlwaysDesc: {0} is used instead of {1} for stat calculations.
LanguageData.XylSubstituteCapacityLowerDesc: {0} is used instead of {1} for stat calculations if it is lower.
LanguageData.XylSubstituteCapacityHigherDesc: {0} is used instead of {1} for stat calculations if it is higher.
LanguageData.XylScenPartForcedXenotypeSummary: {0} have a {1} chance to start with xenotype: {2}
